0.1.name: wordpress/wp-post-redirect
0.1.description: With Post Redirect you can make a redirect when accessing your posts and point to an external link. When activated, you will see a new metabox in the "New Post" screen, that allows you to set a new url where the user should be redirected. Simply and efficient!

1.1.name: wordpress/wp-post-redirect
